name: HYH: API & System Health
description: Monitor API performance, errors, and external service health for Hey You're Hired

panels.title: Error Events
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired severity=3 | timechart span=1h count

panels.title: Errors by Type
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired severity=3 | stats count as error_count by message | sort -error_count | head 10

panels.title: Stripe Webhook Errors
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Stripe webhook error" | timechart span=1h count

panels.title: Feature Failures
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Feature failed*" | stats count by message

panels.title: Recent Errors
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired severity=3 | table timestamp hostname message | head 20

name: HYH: Blog Performance
description: Track blog engagement, read completion, and content performance for Hey You're Hired

panels.title: Blog Views Over Time
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Blog article viewed" | timechart span=1d count

panels.title: Views by Article
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Blog article viewed" | stats count as view_count by blog_title | sort -view_count | head 10

panels.title: Views by Category
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Blog article viewed" | stats count by blog_category

panels.title: Articles Read to Completion
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Blog article read completed" | timechart span=1d count

panels.title: Avg Scroll Depth by Article
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Blog engagement" | stats avg(scroll_depth) as avg_scroll by blog_title | sort -avg_scroll

panels.title: Avg Time on Page
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Blog engagement" | stats avg(time_on_page) as avg_time by blog_title | sort -avg_time

name: HYH: Conversion Funnel
description: Track the complete user journey from visit to paid subscription

panels.title: Full Funnel
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired | eval stage=case(message="User signup completed", "1. Signup", message="Checkout started", "2. Checkout", message="Payment conversion tracked", "3. Paid") | stats count by stage | sort stage

panels.title: Signups to Checkout Rate
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="User signup completed" OR message="Checkout started" | stats count as event_count by message | sort -event_count

panels.title: Checkout to Paid Rate
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Checkout started" OR message="Payment conversion tracked" | stats count as event_count by message | sort -event_count

panels.title: Daily Conversion Events
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="User signup completed" OR message="Checkout started" OR message="Payment conversion tracked" | timechart span=1d count by message

name: HYH: Feature Usage
description: Track which features are being used in Hey You're Hired

panels.title: Cover Letters Generated
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Feature completed: cover_letter" | timechart span=1d count

panels.title: Career Coach Sessions
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Feature used: career_coach" | timechart span=1d count

panels.title: Job Recommendations Requests
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Feature used: job_recommendations" | timechart span=1d count

panels.title: Job Searches by Title
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Feature used: job_recommendations" | stats count as search_count by job_titles | sort -search_count | head 10

panels.title: Resume Tailoring
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Feature used: resume_tailoring" | timechart span=1d count

panels.title: Resume Uploads
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Feature used: resume_upload" | timechart span=1d count

name: HYH: Job Search Performance
description: Monitor job API performance, fallbacks, and search quality for Hey You're Hired

panels.title: External API Requests
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="External API*request" | timechart span=1h count

panels.title: Active Jobs DB API
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="External API: Active Jobs DB*" | stats count by message

panels.title: JobSpy API Activity
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="External API: JobSpy*" OR message="JobSpy*" | stats count by message

panels.title: Job Orchestrator Events
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Job orchestrator*" | stats count by message

panels.title: Orchestrator Fallback Chain
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Job orchestrator: Fallback*" OR message="Job orchestrator: Primary*" | timechart span=1d count by message

panels.title: Deduplication Stats
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Job orchestrator: Deduplication complete" | timechart span=1d count

panels.title: Jobs Found per Search
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Feature completed: job_recommendations" | timechart span=1d avg(jobs_found)

name: HYH: Revenue & Subscriptions
description: Track subscriptions, revenue, and churn for Hey You're Hired

panels.title: New Subscriptions
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Subscription synced" status="active" | timechart span=1d count

panels.title: Subscriptions by Plan
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Subscription synced" | stats count by plan_name

panels.title: Stripe Webhook Events
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Stripe webhook received" | stats count by event_type

panels.title: Subscription Status
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Subscription synced" | stats count by status

panels.title: Recent Subscription Events
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Subscription synced" | table timestamp user_id plan_name status | head 20

name: HYH: User Acquisition & Funnel
description: Track signups, conversions, and user sources for Hey You're Hired

panels.title: Signups Over Time
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="User signup completed" | timechart span=1d count

panels.title: Signups by Source
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="User signup completed" | stats count by utm_source

panels.title: Signups by Auth Method
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Signup conversion" | stats count by method

panels.title: Daily Active Users
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="User login" OR message="User signup completed" | timechart span=1d dc(user_id)

panels.title: Checkout Started
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Checkout started" | timechart span=1d count

panels.title: Payment Conversions
panels.query: search app_name=hey-youre-hired message="Payment conversion" OR message="Payment conversion tracked" | timechart span=1d count
